item.title: Why AI Needs So Much Data â€” and What It Does With It
item.description:
AI is kind of like a student. But instead of reading textbooks, it learns by looking at huge amounts of data.

If youâ€™ve ever wondered why companies collect so much data, or why AI needs it, this post will explain it in simple terms.
